page.title: 10Smallholding.
page.content:
We have an acre of glasshouses (20) surrounded by 2 acres of land, plus a 4 acre allotment. The glasshouse crops consist of 6,400 tomato plants (16 houses) which produce 4000 boxes of tomatoes, plus 2 houses of cucumber and the rest in cauliflower plants. A quarter of a million tulips are cropped from January to April. Ninety thousand bulbs are bought from Holland and the rest grow in our allotments. On our surrounding 2 acres, we grow 2 crops of cauliflowers per year- 40,000 all told. There are 10,000 lilies on our 2 acre field. On our allotment, one and a half acres are tulip bulbs, one and a half acres are broccoli, half an acre is cauliflower and half acre is cabbage.
J.W. and G.M.Needham.
